Package apcs.fraction

Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
apcs.fraction.Fraction
public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
This class models a Fraction and implements common operations
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
JP Kerrane (hi@jameskerrane.com)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Fraction​(int numerator, int denominator)
    Creates a new instance of fraction with a numerator and denominator.
    Fraction​(int wholeNumber, Fraction mixed)
    Creates a new instance of fraction using a mixed fraction.

    • Fraction

      public Fraction​(int numerator, int denominator)
      Creates a new instance of fraction with a numerator and denominator.
      Parameters:
      numerator - Numerator for the fraction you want to create.
      denominator - Denominator for the fraction you want to create.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • Fraction

      public Fraction​(int wholeNumber, Fraction mixed)
      Creates a new instance of fraction using a mixed fraction. You supply a whole number and the accompanying fraction.
      Parameters:
      wholeNumber - Whole number for the first part of the fraction.
      mixed - Fraction that accompanies the whole number.
      Since:
      1.0.0
